Author: rms
Content: With companies that are too new to be profitable, it has more to do with what the venture capitalist is willing to invest for a certain % ownership than an appraisal of the actual value of a company.

Author: matth
Title: How are valuations for startups established?
Content: How exactly do VCs and the like figure out how much a company is potentially worth? X amount of user, demographic coverage + allure, X% growth month-to-month?

Author: rms
Content: It's going to be much, much easier to cure gene-related diseases in our children. Eventually we'll get both, but it's much easier to genetically modify the unborn than to engineer the living.
